name: intelliRock Sensor Data File
summary: Learn about .IROCK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Logger data recorded by intelliRock sensors is encrypted and saved in an unalterable format, which ensures data integrity. IROCK files can be transferred to a PC and analyzed using rockWare software.

description: Data file format used by intelliRock and intelliRock II concrete measurement devices; records physical properties of in-place concrete in real-time.
